column4: hey is it safe to use the repositorys for gutsy if im running fiesty? for such apps as apache/snort etc?
it'll upgrade a bunch of stuff to gutsy versions, without the benefit of the update tool
might work, but you'll be unsupportable, and probably have to reinstall unless you like playing with dpkg on your weekends :p
really, seriously, don't do it unless you fix the os installs for fun
